components.heading: Tactile Archetype
components.subText: And that bird? That's a macaw.

components.heading: Tactile is a content management system
components.subText: It is built on NodeJS, ExpressJS and Polymer.

components.text: Tactile is a web content management platform composed of interoperable modules.

components.heading: This is an eample third level page

components.text: Tactile is composed of different modules which can each be used, or not used, providing great flexibility.
It allowed websites to be build from pages and reusable components.
It is designed to have context driven behavior built upon the ease of use of javascript and json. This example project displays many of the features.
For example the footer of this website is inherited from the home page and the navigation at the top is auto generated from the page hierarchy.

components.heading: Tactile Broker
components.subText: Straps together the websites content with the pages and components that bring that content to life.

components.heading: Tactile Clerk
components.subText: Serves up the tactile backend and is built on ExpressJS

components.heading: Tactile Gulp
components.subText: Frontend build process using gulp that integrates with tactile.
